results.description: Striker Stefano Okaka joins Italian side Udinese from Watford on a three-year deal.
results.title: Stefano Okaka: Italy striker joins Udinese from Watford

results.description: Watford captain Troy Deeney has undergone minor knee surgery and will be out of action for several weeks
results.shortTitle: Watford captain Deeney has knee surgery
results.title: Troy Deeney to miss several games after minor operation on his knee

results.description: New Swansea loan signing Ben Wilmot says his previous loan to Udinese in the rough and tumble of Serie A made him a better player and person.
results.shortTitle: 'They're daunting places to play, in front of some horrible fans'
results.title: 'They're daunting places to play, in front of some horrible fans' - Ben Wilmot

results.description: Atalanta move into Italy's final Champions League spot as late goals from Marten de Roon and Mario Pasalic gave them a 2-0 win over Udinese.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta move into Champions League spot
results.title: Atalanta 2-0 Udinese: Home side move into Serie A Champions League places

results.description: Arsenal goalkeeper David Ospina is taken to hospital after collapsing during the first half of Napoli's Serie A match against Udinese on Sunday.
results.title: David Ospina: Arsenal goalkeeper collapses during Napoli game

results.description: Teenager Moise Kean scores twice as a weakened Juventus beat Udinese to go 19 points clear at the top of Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Kean scores twice as Juve go 19 clear
results.title: Juventus 4-1 Udinese: Moise Kean scores twice as champions go 19 points clear

results.description: Juventus host Udinese in Serie A as they look to go 19 points clear at the top - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Juventus v Udinese - teenager Kean scores twice
results.title: Juventus v Udinese live in Serie A

results.description: Nottingham Forest sign centre-half Molla Wague from Udinese and Sweden international defender Alexander Milosevic.
results.shortTitle: Forest bring in Wague and Milosevic
results.title: Molla Wague and Alexander Milosevic join Nottingham Forest

thumbnail.altText: Molla Wague in action for Watford
Molla Wague in action for Watford
Molla Wague in action for Watford

results.description: Watford's Ben Wilmot and Jerome Sinclair join Udinese and Oxford respectively on loan deals until end of the season.
results.title: Watford: Ben Wilmot joins Udinese and Jerome Sinclair moves to Oxford on loan deals

results.description: Napoli's hopes of securing a first Serie A title since 1990 suffer a blow with a goalless draw at AC Milan.
results.shortTitle: Napoli title hopes hit by Milan draw
results.title: AC Milan 0-0 Napoli: Visitors' Serie A title hopes hit

results.description: Watford striker Stefano Okaka joins Italian club Udinese on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Watford's Okaka joins Udinese on loan
results.title: Stefano Okaka: Watford and Italy striker joins Udinese on loan

results.description: Text updates as Real Madrid travel to Alaves in La Liga after Cristiano Ronaldo scores in Juventus's win at Udinese in Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid lose at Alaves after Ronaldo scores in Juve win
results.title: Real Madrid at Alaves after Cristiano Ronaldo scores in Juventus win

results.description: It is not unheard of for footballers to be suspended for head-butting or even biting... but an Italian midfielder has been banned for blasphemy.
results.title: Udinese's Rolando Mandragora suspended for 'blasphemous remarks'

results.description: Nantes create a clip of the hit video game Fortnite to introduce Brazilian midfielder Lucas Evangelista as their new signing.
results.shortTitle: Fortnite clip reveals new Nantes signing
results.title: Lucas Evangelista: Nantes create Fortnite clip to announce new signing

results.description: Follow live coverage of Crotone v Juventus and Real Madrid v Athletic Bilbao, plus updates from Caen v PSG in the French Cup semi-final.
results.shortTitle: European football: Ronaldo scores late equaliser for Real Madrid
results.title: European football: Real Madrid losing to Athletic Bilbao

results.description: Udinese players wear 11 different shirts from 11 seasons for their Serie A game against Lazio, before auctioning them for charity.
results.title: Udinese 1-2 Lazio: Udinese players wear 11 different shirts from 11 seasons

results.description: Fans of Fiorentina and Udinese held a minute's applause during the game which was rearranged after the death of Italy defender Davide Astori.
results.title: Udinese 0-2 Fiorentina

results.description: Former Manchester United winger Nani scores as Lazio cement a top-three spot in Serie A with victory over Udinese.
results.title: Lazio 3-0 Udinese

thumbnail.altText: Nani celebrates scoring for Lazio against Udinese

results.description: Napoli return to the top of Serie A as they maintain their unbeaten start to the league season.
results.title: Udinese 0-1 Napoli

results.description: Juventus avoid the ignominy of becoming the first side to concede points to Benevento as they move up to second in Serie A with victory.
results.title: Juventus 2-1 Benevento
